summary: "Pirates of the Caribbean: Dead Man's Chest" is a 2006 adventure movie directed by Gore Verbinski. It's the second film in the Pirates of the Caribbean series. The story picks up a year after the first movie, with Captain Jack Sparrow in trouble with Davy Jones, a scary sea captain. Jack owes Jones a debt and is now being chased by a sea monster called the Kraken. Meanwhile, Will Turner and Elizabeth Swann's wedding is interrupted by Lord Cutler Beckett, who wants Will to find Jack's magical compass. The film was made in 2005 at various locations and broke several box office records when it released in 2006.
title: Pirates of the Caribbean Dead Man's Chest
